moduleMetadataJson.name: PostgreSQL Server Generic Query
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module imports a file local on the PostgreSQL Server into a
          temporary table, reads it, and then drops the temporary table.
          It requires PostgreSQL credentials with table CREATE privileges
          as well as read privileges to the target file.
author: todb <todb@metasploit.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: RHOSTS
options.description: The target host(s), range CIDR identifier, or hosts file with syntax 'file:<path>'

options.name: PASSWORD
options.description: The password for the specified username. Leave blank for a random password.
